text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://cdr.com/hiv-regimen-codes
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    874950001Product containing only efavirenz and lamivudine and tenofovir - TDF + 3TC + EFV
    324859007Product containing lamivudine and zidovudine - AZT + 3TC + ATV/r - AZT + 3TC + LPV/r
    776467001AZT + 3TC + NVP - Product containing only lamivudine and nevirapine and zidovudine
    787163007DRV/r + DTG + TDF/3TC - Product containing dolutegravir and lamivudine
    413381000Product containing abacavir and lamivudine - ABC + 3TC + LPV/r - ABC + 3TC + EFV - ABC + 3TC + NVP

AZT + 3TC + NVP - Product containing only lamivudine and nevirapine and zidovudine

Product containing abacavir and lamivudine - ABC + 3TC + LPV/r - ABC + 3TC + EFV - ABC + 3TC + NVP
